name: Spectral Astro
description:
Based on the retro game known as "Asteroids", Spectral Astro aims to provide similar gameplay with new mechanics and even a "story." Or at least somewhat of a story...

Features:

- Upgrades
- Retro gameplay style
- Online leader board
- Asteroids like gameplay

Controls:

W - Forward
A  - Turn left
D - Turn right
Space - Shoot

Story:

T̶̺̰̐h̸̞̱̅e̶̯̬̕r̴̪̩͌̿e̵̠̙͘ ̸̖̂̓͜i̴̱͂͋s̸̢͉̊̓ ̴̮̦͘n̸̛͓o̶̹͇͑t̸̰͚͠ĥ̵͜i̵̞͘ń̸̝́g̵͖͛͋ ̷͓̼̐t̶͖̥̊o̷̝̰͒ ̴̻͋̊s̸̯̦̍̽ẹ̴̆̓e̸̘͝
